item.title: Easy, but idk
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

i got two errrors now
first one:

server.java:182: ‘else’ without ‘if’
{ else }
^

second one:

server.java:192: ‘;’ expected
} else {
^

2 Errors…
Finished…

item.title: Easy, but idk
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

There’re two things, really. I didn’t bother to look through the whole block of code you posted, so there may be others, but that segment in particular has two things wrong with it.

Firstly, you forgot to end this line:
misc.println(“A runserver is already on…”)

And secondly, the first curly bracket here is backwards:
{ else }

Read full topic

item.title: Easy, but idk
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

[quote=“Bacus23, post:1, topic:175576”]i was editing my server.java

this section:

[code] }
} catch (java.io.IOException ioe) {
if (!shutdownClientHandler) {
misc.println(
“A runserver is already on…”
)
{ else }
misc.println(“ClientHandler was shut down.”);
}
}
}

public void killServer() {
    try {
        shutdownClientHandler = true;
        if (clientListener != null) {
            clientListener.close();
        }
        clientListener = null;
    } catch (java.lang.Exception __ex) {
        __ex.printStackTrace();
    }
}

public static int EnergyRegian = 0;

public static int MaxConnections = 100000;
public static String[] Connections = new String[MaxConnections];
public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections];
public static boolean ShutDown = false;
public static int ShutDownCounter = 0;

}
[/code]

and i got this error: server.java:193 ‘;’ expected
{ else }
^

1 Error Finished[/quote]

        if (!shutdownClientHandler) {
            misc.println(
                    "A runserver is already on..."
                            )
        { else }

I’ll give you a hint: it’s right there.

Read full topic
